JobTitle: Business Planning and Operations Program Manager, GBG Sales
JobFullDesc: Facebook is seeking a highly quantitative, driven, process and detail-oriented Program Manager, who will serve as a member of Facebook’s Sales Operations team. The mission of the Global Sales Operations group is to maximize business performance by being the objective, trusted partner to the sales organization – through strategic planning, cross-functional collaboration and operational excellence. We also identify and drive critical projects and strategic initiatives to support revenue growth. This role will have a day-to-day focus on providing analytical, strategic, and operational support for Facebook’s Global Business Group. This will entail analyzing market, advertiser and agency performance on a regular basis, defining go-to-market strategy and programs, and leading annual planning across teams.  This role will work cross-functionally with several organizations at Facebook (including Product Marketing, Product Analytics, Finance, and Sales), with the primary objective of enabling leadership to make effective, analytically driven, and strategic operating decisions. You will be passionate about Facebook, interested in advertising, intellectually curious, a fast learner, analytical, comfortable with ambiguity and working independently, able to focus on the details while thinking strategically, while remaining focused on high impact projects.Relationships: Develop strong collaborative relationships across the Global Business Group and key stakeholders in the sales organization to understand business needs and provide central recommendation and supportBusiness Insights: Generate insights into both internal team and external market performance.
